title: Peach Couture Women's Geometric Square Hi Low Mid-Length Shift Dress
features: New By Peach Couture (A Registered Trademark)
The dress features ¾ sleeves and a fully lined bodice, as well as a matching fabric belt.
Care: Can be washed in a washing machine, but only on a delicate cycle. To air dry your dress, simply put it on a hanger and place it in a breezy area until it dries.
Featuring keyhole design neckline, with optional button roll up sleeves for an altered look.

Product Dimensions (Inches): LENGTH- Small: 38 Medium: 40 Large: 42 XL: 42 HIPS- Small: 44 Medium: 48 Large: 50 XL: 52 WAIST- Small: 38 Medium: 40 Large: 50 XL: 52 BUST- Small: 38 Medium: 40 Large: 46 XL: 55
description: Hi-Lo Dress with gorgeous black and white geometric print is great for all seasons. The breathable and stretchy polyester feels like a dream. Dress this outfit up with heels at night and dress it down with flats and a cardigan for work during the day. You can choose yourself from the variety of different colors and styles which one would fit you most. The dress features ¾ sleeves and a fully lined bodice, as well as a matching fabric belt. Material: 100% Polyester.
